Top Memes of 2009

Comments:


marilyn wrote:

Gotta love those infectious memes!

on Nov. 10th, 2009

Email List

Send the List "Top Memes of 2009" to the address below:





5 points

  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
5.00 from 3 votes

Created: Nov. 8th, 2009

Tags:Top 2009, memes

 

  • Cat drinking from the kitchen sink

    This mem found me on facebook as it got passed from wall to wall. This insatiable feline has some creative drinking habits: Put head under the faucet, and lap up the drips that fall past mouth. Woody, the cat from Japan is quite fond of faucets. His owner has 4 such videos on HolaKenty's youtube page.

  • Camera hog, er... um... squirel

    This fiesty little squirel outside of Banff, AB made the cover of my local newspaper with his antics. The little fella is certainly skilled at being cute, and capturing the focus of attention!

  • Balloon Boy

    This meme hit hard and fast on October 15th 2009. The world gazed at their screens in amazement as they were told a 6 year old boy was flying high above Colorado in a home built air balloon, and no one could get hime down. The internet was relieved when the young boy was found alive and well. He hadn't been in the balloon the entire time. Then shock struck again when it was revealed that the whole thing was an elaborate hoax by the family, who were hoping to get a reality show. Shown: a meme on top of a meme!

  • Jill & Kevin's Wedding Dance

    When Jill & Kevin got hitched in June 2009, they made quite a hit with their wedding video on youtube, with their very untraditional walk down the ailse. The entire wedding party danced down the ailse to Chris' Brown's tune Forever. Afterwards the video link was passed around the internet so much, that their youtube video has seen well over 30 million hits! The couple has since started a website to take advantage of their notariety to raise funds to end domestic abuse.

    Check out the original Jill & Kevin Wedding Dance

  • Kanye's Taylor Swift Interruption

    When Kanye West stole the mic from a confused Taylor Swift at the 2009 MTV Video Awards, he started one of the funniest memes the Internet has seen. The effect of the actual event was light. It was just Kayne stirring up some nonesense. There was no real harm done, certainly none to Taylor Swift who enjoyed the talkshow circuit following immediately event. What made this meme stick the the creativity of the internet community. People from all over started photoshopping Kanye into different pictures, each in which he's unleashes on the subject as he did on Taylor Swift.

  • Susan Boyle

    The meme to prove that apperances aren't always what they seem. Susan Boyle's angellic voice shocked everyone watching, and captured the attention of the entire internet!

    Check out the appearance that started it all off: Susan Boyle on Britains Got Talent, and watch for Susan Boyle's debut album I Dreamed a Dream, due out late November 2009.
